channel.title: Ralph Waldo Emerson on Nicola Iarocci
channel.description: Recent content in Ralph Waldo Emerson on Nicola Iarocci

item.title: Quoting Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description:
I cannot remember the books I’ve read any more than the meals I have eaten; even so, they have made me.

– Ralph Waldo Emerson (debated, see here)
item.content:encoded:
I cannot remember the books I’ve read any more than the meals I have eaten; even so, they have made me.

– Ralph Waldo Emerson (debated, see here)
